    • findAllByToken

      @Query("select s.id as id, s.title as title, s.status as status, s.createDate as createDate, s.createBy.eppn as createByEppn, sb.endDate as endDate\nfrom SignRequest s\njoin SignBook as sb on sb.id = s.parentSignBook.id\njoin sb.liveWorkflow as lw\njoin lw.workflow as w\njoin w.wsAccessTokens as t\nwhere :token in (t)\n") List<SignRequestWsDto> findAllByToken(WsAccessToken token)

    • findAllForWs

      @Query("select s.id as id, s.title as title, s.status as status, s.createDate as createDate, s.createBy.eppn as createByEppn, sb.endDate as endDate from SignRequest s join SignBook as sb on sb.id = s.parentSignBook.id") List<SignRequestWsDto> findAllForWs()

    • findByCreateByEppnAndStatus

      List<SignRequest> findByCreateByEppnAndStatus(String createByEppn, SignRequestStatus status)

    • countByCreateByEppnAndStatus

      @Query("select count(distinct s.parentSignBook) from SignRequest s join s.parentSignBook.liveWorkflow.currentStep.recipients r where s.status = :status and (s.parentSignBook.deleted is null or s.parentSignBook.deleted != true) and s.parentSignBook.createBy.eppn = :createByEppn\n") Long countByCreateByEppnAndStatus(String createByEppn, SignRequestStatus status)

    • findByIdAndRecipient

      @Query("select s from SignRequest s join s.recipientHasSigned rhs where s.id = :id and key(rhs).user.eppn = :recipientUserEppn") List<SignRequest> findByIdAndRecipient(Long id, String recipientUserEppn)

    • findByCreateByEppnAndOlderPending

      @Query(value="select * from sign_request where create_by_id = :userId and DATE_PART(\'day\', now() - create_date) > :nbBeforeWarning and status = \'pending\' and warning_readed = false", nativeQuery=true) List<SignRequest> findByCreateByEppnAndOlderPending(Long userId, Integer nbBeforeWarning)

    • findByCreateByEppn

    • findByOlderPendingAndWarningReaded

      @Query(value="select * from sign_request where DATE_PART(\'day\', now() - create_date) > :nbBeforeDelete and status = \'pending\' and warning_readed = true", nativeQuery=true) List<SignRequest> findByOlderPendingAndWarningReaded(Integer nbBeforeDelete)
